1.0.name: wordpress/wp-costum-login-logo
1.0.description: Just create one image called wp-custom-login-logo.png and put in the plugin folder. After this Activate the plugin. I've created this because i use wordpress as a CMS and sometimes users like their logo in the login form. For more plugins visit My WP Blog
